definition: refrain (from doing sth)/(coll.) Come on!/Give me a break!/Save it!
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Phoebe: Come on, like you never talk that.
sentences.chinese: 少來了，你們從未談論過。

sentences.english: Not now, I'm sick. - Oh, come on, you big faker !
sentences.chinese: 現在不行，我病了少來了，大騙子。

sentences.english: Come on. Here is for enjoying and exciting.
sentences.chinese: 少來，這裏是來開心和刺激的。

sentences.english: Chuck: No, this is my game. I pick the players.
sentences.chinese: 少來，這是我搞的比賽，由我來挑選參賽人員。

sentences.english: I thinking about you , oh , come on.
Ah, Come on, clowfish. Do something funny.
sentences.chinese: 少來了，小丑，對，來一點有趣的。

sentences.english: Come on, it's a joke, Carrie.
sentences.chinese: 少來了，我在開玩笑，凱莉。
